DOC.brief_summary: In sequential , multiple assignment , randomize trial ( SMART ) current smoker eligible lung cancer screen identify use electronic medical record University Minnesota Minneapolis VA ( N=1000 ) . All participant receive 8 week evidence-based first-line smoking cessation treatment . Participants eligible three potential randomization one year smoking intervention : 1 ) timing identify early response treatment 4 vs. 8 week ( participant ) , 2 ) telephone-based tobacco longitudinal care ( TLC ) vs. TLC plus pharmacist-administered Medication Therapy Management ( incomplete responder first-line treatment , Primary Aim ) , 3 ) monthly TLC contact vs. quarterly TLC contact ( complete responder first-line treatment , Secondary Aim ) . The primary outcome 6 month prolong abstinence measure 18 month begin treatment .
